name: Thane Rourke
title: Captain of independent cargo vessel 'Stella's Dream'
core_wound: Lost the love of his life (Cassandra Meridian) 30 years ago when her family forced her to marry Lysander Ashford; has carried that heartbreak ever since, never marrying or moving on
wants: To reconnect with Cassandra and see if anything remains of what they had
needs: To accept that the past is past and find a way to build a new life, whether with or without Cassandra
voice_markers: Warm and expressive with working-class accent
Uses spacer slang and ship metaphors constantly
Tends to deflect serious emotions with humor
Has a storyteller's way of speaking - everything's an anecdote
Says 'by the void' as his favorite curse
contradiction: Presents as carefree wanderer but is deeply sentimental and romantic; claims he's moved on but has structured his entire life to avoid commitment; wants Cassandra but also resents her for choosing duty over love
physical_description: Ruggedly handsome in a weathered way. Graying hair and laugh lines. Fit from years of physical ship work. Dresses in practical spacer gear - worn jacket, comfortable boots. Has a scar across his jaw from a bar fight years ago.

relationships.Cassandra_Ashford: Lost love from 30 years ago; hasn't seen her since she married Lysander; arriving at Celestia Prime will force confrontation with the past
relationships.Sienna_Cross: Becomes her unlikely mentor and father figure; doesn't know she's connected to Cassandra through Lysander
relationships.Marcus_Ashford: Cassandra's son; will meet him and see Cassandra in him; complicated feelings
relationships.Rafe_Stone: His first mate and friend; knows all about the Cassandra situation
relationships.The_Unbound: Respected among independent spacers and traders; known for being reliable and honorable
relationships.Lysander_Ashford: The man who married his love; has hated him from afar for 30 years without ever meeting him

secrets: Has been tracking Cassandra's life from afar for 30 years through news and gossip
Named his ship 'Stella's Dream' - Stella was his and Cassandra's private nickname for their imagined daughter
Carries a locket with Cassandra's picture from 30 years ago
Has been hired for a cargo run to Celestia Prime - deliberately took the job hoping to see her
Works occasionally as courier for reformist movements - his way of fighting the system that took Cassandra
knowledge_state: Expert pilot and ship captain with 30+ years experience
Knows trade routes and smuggling paths throughout the seven systems
Connected to Unbound network - knows their secrets and safe harbors
Aware of general political tensions but not insider knowledge
Does not know Cassandra still thinks of him
Does not know he's about to walk into a powder keg at Celestia Prime
